name: Starcaders
description:
My first game: Starcaders - An arcade space top-down shooter. 

You can find a demo video below. Unfortunately, the beautiful soundtrack hasn't been recorded in the demo, so make sure to try the game to hear it!

Feedback appreciated! :)

Note: The leaderboard doesn't work here on Itch.io unfortunately, if you want to see & contribute to the leaderboard, go play the game on https://starcaders.com/.
